detailed_results.command: touch a1 a2 b1 b2; echo [ab]*

bash_result.stderr:
bash: -c: line 1: syntax error near unexpected token `('
bash: -c: line 1: `echo \$(echo test)'

detailed_results.command: case hello in hello) echo match;; esac
case test in hello) echo no;; *) echo yes;; esac
case abc in a*) echo starts_with_a;; esac
for i in 1 2 3; do echo $i; done
for word in hello world; do echo $word; done
if true; then echo yes; fi
if false; then echo no; fi
if true; then echo yes; else echo no; fi
if false; then echo no; else echo yes; fi
i=0; while [ $i -lt 3 ]; do echo $i; i=$((i+1)); done
while false; do echo never; done
show() { echo $# $1 $2; }; show a b c
show_all() { echo "$@"; }; show_all one two three
set a b c; echo $1; shift; echo $1
